General.Name: Chengtun Mining Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengtun Mining Group Co., Ltd. engages in non-ferrous metal mining activities in China. The company explores for cobalt, copper, nickel, and zinc varieties. It also involved in non-ferrous metal trade services. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Eagle Mining Group Co., Ltd. Chengtun Mining Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: Tower A, Porter Manpower Center, Xiamen, China
